text.text_translated:
Small animals are a common sight in many cities and towns.  
They include birds, squirrels, mice and insects.  
In recent years, the world’s press is full of reports.  
The reports show wild animals coming into cities.  
They come in bigger and bigger numbers.  
There are bears in Vancouver parks.  
There are leopards on the streets of Mumbai.  
There are wild pigs in gardens in Berlin.  
What happens when bigger animals come into our cities?  
Are they welcome or considered a danger or a pest?  
A pest is an animal that can harm people or plants.

feedback.feedback: FAIL: Factual Inaccuracy. The writer added a new fact: "A pest is an animal that can harm people or plants." This definition is not in the original text.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Small animals are a common sight in many cities and towns.  
They include birds, squirrels, mice and insects.  
In recent years, the world’s press is full of reports.  
The reports show wild animals coming into cities.  
They come in bigger and bigger numbers.  
There are bears in Vancouver parks.  
There are leopards on the streets of Mumbai.  
There are wild pigs in gardens in Berlin.  
What happens when bigger animals come into our cities?  
Are they welcome or considered a danger or a pest?  
A pest is an animal that can harm people or plants.
